text: (bright music)
- [Narrator] AWS and the PGA TOUR

are partnering to
rapidly transform content
into exciting new digital experiences
that provide fans with a more complete

and personalized experience
across TOUR competition.

The TOUR launched every
shot live at the players,
which allowed the TOUR to capture

and distribute every
shot from every player.
Something made possible on AWS.

A variety of AWS products
enable the PGA TOUR
to create TOUR cast experiences,

which is an evolution
of the TOUR leaderboard
that gives fans video game-like control
of the golf viewing experience

and displayed player and
shot stats on demand.
AWS has become a trustee of First Tee,

a youth development organization
supported by the TOUR

that reaches more than
3.7 million young people
around the world each year.

AWS will assist in developing
an online community
for coaches, parents and participants,

helping them build their
strength of character
through the game of golf.
(bright music)
